summary.span: 获取表的列集合。

span.span: Gets the column collection for the table.
A collection that contains the columns for the table.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. 在此示例中，已将动态数据页模板复制到 \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions 文件夹，以提供 AdventureWorksLT 数据库的 ProductDescription 表的自定义显示。In the example, the Dynamic Data page templates have been copied to the \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions folder to provide a custom display for the ProductDescription table of the AdventureWorksLT database. 更改了 Insert .aspx 文件的标记，以添加名为 `DetailsView1_DataBound`的 `OnDataBound` 事件处理程序。The markup of the Insert.aspx file is changed to add an `OnDataBound` event handler named `DetailsView1_DataBound`. 在事件处理程序中， 方法用于查找元表。In the event handler, the method is used to find the meta table. 属性用于显示表中的列数。The property is used to display the number of columns in the table. [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/Insert.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/Insert.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 当此表中的项用作外键关系中的父级时，获取用于显示值的列。

span.span: Gets the column that is used to display values when entries in this table are used as parents in foreign-key relationships.

value.span: 当此表中的项用作外键关系中的父级时，用于显示值的列。

span.span: The column that is used to display values when entries in this table are used as parents in foreign-key relationships.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按此顺序选择返回的列：The column that is returned is selected in this order: 1. 使用 特性指定的列。The column that is specified by using the attribute. 2. 不在主键中的第一个字符串列。The first string column that is not in the primary key. 3. 主键中的第一个字符串列。The first string column that is in the primary key. 4. 主键中的第一个非字符串列。The first non-string column that is in the primary key. 5. 第一列。The first column.

summary.span: 初始化调用构造函数后可能不可用的数据。

span.span: Initializes data that may not be available when the constructor is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法对 实例中的每个列调用 方法。This method calls the method for each column in the instance. 不能直接调用此方法。This method cannot be called directly. 若要自定义初始化，可以从此类派生并重写 方法。To customize initialization, you can derive from this class and override the method. 如果重写此方法，请调用基控件的 `Initialize` 方法。If you override this method, call the base control's `Initialize` method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写 方法，以便自定义初始化过程。The following example shows how to override the method in order to customize the initialization process. ```csharp protected override void Initialize() { base.Initialize(); MyOverriddenInit(); } ``` ```vb Protected Overloads Overrides Sub Initialize() MyBase.Initialize() MyOverriddenInit() End Sub ```
